name: Coins
description: Cash Money.

name: Shuniku Berries
description: Disgusting tasting berries that will stain your mouth red.

name: Wood Carving Knife
description: A specially designed knife for carving wood.

name: Magic Wood Carving Knife
description: A specially designed knife for carving wood. This one's magical.

name: No Soliciting Sign
description: A nicely written sign.
gatherString: You paint letters neatly onto the sign.

name: Rock Tumbler
description: A round box full of hard rocks. You can smooth gemstones down with it.

name: Small Red Library Key
description: A small key from the Sawoka dungeon library. It looks very fragile, but maybe it can open something.

name: Small Orange Library Key
description: A small key from the Sawoka dungeon library. It looks very fragile, but maybe it can open something.

name: Small Green Library Key
description: A small key from the Sawoka dungeon library. It looks very fragile, but maybe it can open something.

name: Graingilt Treasure Key
description: A luxurious key to some of the Graingilt treasure halls.

name: Yoga Mat
description: A soft mat to do yoga on. You wouldn't want to have to just use the ground, would you?

name: Feather
description: Soft, fluffy, and useful for making arrows with.
gatherString: You separate the feathers into a pile.

name: Ice Feather
description: Soft, fluffy, cold, and useful for making arrows with.
gatherString: You separate the feathers into a pile.

name: Glittering Plume
description: A beautiful feather that sparkles in the light.
gatherString: You separate the feathers into a pile.

name: Storm's Eye
description: A terrifying eyeball. Can it see?

name: Chicken Egg
description: A small egg from a chicken.

name: Chicken Meat
description: The meat of a chicken.

name: Rooster Plumage
description: A bunch of feathers from a male chicken.

name: Cheese
description: Some stinky cheese.
gatherString: You pick up some old cheese.

name: Bone Shard
description: A shard of bone dropped by a gashadokuro. You could form this into some kind of weapon.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bit of bone dropped by a stormwalker. You could form this into some kind of weapon.

name: Hemp
description: A fast-growing weed useful for turning into fiber.

name: Rope
description: A bunch of fibers tied together. You could use this to climb things, probably.

name: Magic Rope
description: A bunch of magical fibers tied together. You could use this to climb things more quickly than with normal rope, probably.

name: Leatherworking Toolkit
description: A set of tools to work leather into form.

name: Lapidary Toolkit
description: A set of tools to work gems into prettier gems.

name: Mercurial Shard
description: A smooth shard from the corpse of a mercurial being. With enough of them you could fashion some kind of weapon...

name: Mercurial Hilt
description: The hilt of a mercurial weapon. It'll need the blade and pommel to be made into a sword.

name: Mercurial Pommel
description: The pommel of a mercurial weapon. It'll need the blade and hilt to be made into a sword.

name: Mercurial Blade
description: The blade of a mercurial weapon. It'll need the hilt and pommel to be made into a sword.

name: Koncave City Passport
description: A passport into the underground city of Koncave.

name: Camel
description: A dromedary exceptionally capable of desert travel.

name: Kyusa Toad
description: A large, dry toad that will let you ride on its back.

name: River Raft
description: It's a shame you can't swim, or you wouldn't have needed to waste money on this.

name: Tiny Rowboat
description: A small boat you can take out to sea. You can't go out of sight of land with it, though.

name: Gym Membership Card
description: This card will let you into the gym in Kogoe.

name: Ice
description: It's cold water.

name: Bandit's Blade
description: The sharp part of a sword. You could probably reattach it to a hilt and make a working weapon with it.

name: Cactus Spines
description: Pokey spines from a cactus.

name: Cactus Club (Empty)
description: A club made from a special living cactus. If you covered it in spines, it would really do some damage.

name: Sand
description: It's tiny little rocks, basically.

name: Ashes
description: This used to be something else, probably.

name: Sandstone
description: Is it stone? Is it sand?

name: Honey
description: Sweet, sweet honey.

name: Baobhan Hair
description: Hair from the head of a baobhan. It's quite valuable.

name: Baobhan Tooth
description: A tooth from the mouth of a baobhan. It's magical.

name: Baobhan Jaw
description: A jaw from the mouth of a baobhan. It's got teeth in it.

name: Great Tree Seed
description: A seed from the Great Tree. It's a prized possesion among the root dwellers of Koncave.

name: Great Tree Fruit
description: A fruit from the Great Tree. It's a large, tasty fruit.

name: Steelflame Axe Handle
description: A handle to a powerful flaming axe. It's missing a head.

name: Steelflame Axe Head
description: A head to a powerful flaming axe. It's missing a handle.

name: Shrinking Cloth
description: A magical cloth once owned by the guardian Imaynimayn. It could be used to make a giant's weapon the right size for you to wield.

name: Dojo Tokens
description: Tokens rewarded for defeating everyone at a dojo.

name: Sweet Berries
description: Delicious berries.

name: Guild Membership Card
description: A card that proves you are a true member of the artisan's guild.

name: Guild Exception Notice
description: A notice that approves a guild member to cancel their current guild task.

name: Bag of Assorted Gems
description: A bag full of assorted gems.

name: Giltgrain Treasure
description: A bag full of treasure.

name: Empty Bottle
description: An empty bottle for storing things in.

name: Bottle of Water
description: A bottle with water in it.

name: Oil of Vitriol
description: A bottle of dangerous liquid.

name: Shears
description: A special pair of scissors made for harvesting the body hair off of unsuspecting animals.

name: On the Sublimation of Various Minerals
description: A book of notes about alchemy. Someone very skilled at the craft wrote this.

name: Intricate Necklace
description: A worn necklace with a beautiful pattern etched into the back side of it.

name: Artisanal Gauntlet
description: By making it harder to work with your hands, you can learn more, faster!

name: Stick
description: It's a stick.

name: Hokibo's Feather
description: A mystical white feather. Perhaps it goes with something?

name: Daranibo's Coin
description: An exceptionally shiny orange coin. Perhaps it goes with something?

name: Kotenbo's Thread
description: An beautiful strand of green thread. Perhaps it goes with something?

name: Auric Tumbler Handle
description: A golden handle for a golden hammer

name: Auric Tumbler Head
description: A golden head for a golden hammer

name: Lion's Mane Stingers
description: A stinger filled with neurotoxin. It looks a little like a cactus spine...
gatherString: You extract some stingers from the lion's mane.
